  • Method Details

    • create

      public static void create(BuildingManager buildingManager, Long companyId) throws CompanyNotFoundException
      Creates a new BuildingManager and associates it with a company.
      Parameters:
      buildingManager - The BuildingManager object to be created and persisted.
      companyId - The ID of the Company with which the building manager will be associated.
      Throws:
      CompanyNotFoundException - If a company with the specified ID does not exist.

    • getById

      public static BuildingManagerDTO getById(long id) throws BuildingManagerNotFoundException
      Retrieves a BuildingManager by its ID and converts it to a DTO.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the BuildingManager to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A DTO representation of the BuildingManager.
      Throws:
      BuildingManagerNotFoundException - If a building with the specified ID does not exist.

    • getBuildingManagers

      public static List<BuildingManagerDTO> getBuildingManagers()
      Retrieves all building managers and converts them to DTOs.
      Returns:
      A list of DTOs representing all BuildingManagers.

    • update

      public static void update(BuildingManager buildingManager, Long buildingManagerId) throws BuildingManagerNotFoundException
      Updates the details of an existing building manager.
      Parameters:
      buildingManager - The updated BuildingManager object.
      buildingManagerId - The ID of the building manager to be updated.
      Throws:
      BuildingManagerNotFoundException - If a building with the specified ID does not exist.

    • fire

      public static void fire(Long buildingManagerId) throws BuildingManagerNotFoundException
      Removes a building manager from their position, reassigning their buildings to other managers.
      Parameters:
      buildingManagerId - The ID of the BuildingManager to be removed.
      Throws:
      BuildingManagerNotFoundException - If no building manager is found with the given ID.

    • getBuildingsByBuildingManagerId

      public static List<Building> getBuildingsByBuildingManagerId(Long buildingManagerId)
      Retrieves a list of buildings managed by a specific building manager.
      Parameters:
      buildingManagerId - The ID of the BuildingManager.
      Returns:
      A list of Buildings managed by the specified building manager.

    • findBuildingManager

      public static BuildingManager findBuildingManager(org.hibernate.Session session, Long buildingManagerId) throws BuildingManagerNotFoundException
      Finds a building manager by their ID.
      Parameters:
      session - The current Hibernate session.
      buildingManagerId - The ID of the BuildingManager.
      Returns:
      The found BuildingManager object.
      Throws:
      BuildingManagerNotFoundException - If no building manager is found with the given ID.

    • delete

      public static void delete(Long buildingManagerId) throws BuildingManagerNotFoundException
      Deletes a building manager by their ID.
      Parameters:
      buildingManagerId - The ID of the BuildingManager to be deleted.
      Throws:
      BuildingManagerNotFoundException - If no building manager is found with the given ID.

      public static List<BuildingManager> buildingManagersSortedByName()
      Retrieves a list of building managers sorted by their name and the size of buildings they manage.
